dblp.social.loader
Class DescriptorLoader

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.loader.DescriptorLoader

public class DescriptorLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines the methods used to parse and load in an in memory structure the XML _partsInfo file. The _partsInfo file is the result of a previous pre-parse.

Author:
Staffiero

parseXmlDescriptor

public boolean parseXmlDescriptor()
                           throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                  java.io.IOException
Parses the XML _partsInfo file and stores the informations in the partFiles array.

Returns:
result of the parse activity: true if the _partsInfo file has been correctly loaded, false otherwise
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException
